description: An upgrade to your shift cables makes your bike feel new again. Optislick coated cables and pre-greased cable housing reduce friction and make shifting feel effortless.OT-SP41 cable housing is greased and features a polyethylene liner.1 OT-SP41 outer casing 1700mm.1 OptiSlick coated stainless steel inner cable ø 1.2mm x 2100mm.1 OptiSlick  coated stainless steel inner cable ø 1.2mm x 1800mm.1 sealed end caps provide grit protection.2 barbed end caps and 3 traditional caps.1 sealed outer cap for rear derailleur.2 inner cable crimp ends.
name: Shimano Optislick Shift Cable Set
